analysis:
Sentiment evolution from last week through this week:

Last week showed a mix of sentiment. CWD's Q2 earnings topped expectations, and CRUS Q1 earnings and sales also exceeded expectations, both showing year-over-year growth. However, Onto Innovation's Q2 earnings missed estimates, although the top line showed 5% year-over-year growth.

This week has been predominantly negative. On 2025-08-11, Salesforce stock plunged 28% year-to-date, raising concerns about the investment. 2025-08-12 has no news.

Key risks/negative factors: Salesforce stock plunge, Onto Innovation earnings miss.
Positive developments: CWD and CRUS earnings/sales exceeded expectations.

Sentiment outlook for today: Neutral.

SAP,2025-08-12,0.00,100.00,0.00,neutral
